name: Canfield Solitaire Collection
description:
20 popular Canfield games in one

Do you love Canfield (also known as "Demon" or "Demon Patience"), but want a bigger challenge?

Now you can play Canfield and other popular variants with different levels of difficulty.

The collection contains:
• Acme
• American Toad
• Canfield
• Chameleon
• Duchess
• Gate
• Rainbow
• Storehouse
• Superior Canfield
• Wings

Plus 10 more...


Features:
• Unlimited undo
• Auto complete
• Statistics
• Rules for each game
